LanguageData.Expectations.stages.skyhigh_expectations: I should be made very comfortable here.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.high_expectations.de: There's no reason I shouldn't have the things I want.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.moderate_expectation: I can't expect to be totally pampered.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.very_low_expectation: I need to keep myself strong to survive.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.extremely_low_expect: I'd better steel myself to survive.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.noble_expectations.d: I am above the little people and should be made happy every moment.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.royal_expectations.d: My majesty... I can hardly believe it myself. A moment's discomfort is below me.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.elite_expectations.d: I shouldn't have to endure any inconveniences that distract me from my important role.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.supreme_expectations: My importance here is uncontested, so my comfort must be a critical priority for my people.
